mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS spreadOrderCount, SUM(IF(uptr.get_agent = 0, uptr.agent_charge, 0)) AS canApplyBrokerage FROM user_pos_transaction_record uptr WHERE uptr.agent_id = #{user.userId} AND uptr.complete_date IS NOT NULL

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(uptr.complete_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS dateKey, COUNT(*) AS orderCount, SUM(uptr.agent_charge) AS brokerage FROM user_pos_transaction_record uptr WHERE uptr.agent_id = #{user.userId} AND uptr.complete_date IS NOT NULL GROUP BY dateKey ORDER BY uptr.complete_date DESC LIMIT #{limitHelper.offset}, #{limitHelper.pageSize}
SELECT SUM(uptr.agent_charge) FROM user_pos_transaction_record uptr WHERE uptr.agent_id = #{user.userId} AND uptr.complete_date IS NOT NULL AND uptr.complete_date < #{deadline} AND uptr.get_agent = 0
mapper.sql: uptr.id AS id, uptr.record_num AS recordNum, uptr.in_card AS inCardId, uptr.out_card_info AS outCardInfo, uptr.user_id AS userId, uptr.amount AS amount, uptr.service_charge AS serviceCharge, uptr.arrival_amount AS arrivalAmount, uptr.pay_charge AS payCharge, uptr.pos_charge AS posCharge, uptr.company_id AS companyId, uptr.cost_type AS costType, uptr.status AS status, uptr.create_date AS createDate, uptr.helibao_zhifu_num AS helibaoZhifuNum, uptr.helibao_tixian_num AS helibaoTixianNum, uptr.pay_date AS payDate, uptr.complete_date AS completeDate
